bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully manipulated aero-shaped tubing, compact design w/ track geo, integrated headset

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, carbon legs, aluminum crown and steerer
1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Venge Aero, FACT carbon, flippable 20/0mm offset
Chainstay protector, clear coat, owners manual
